Eval_centre_PolyMAC_Elem Class Reference

class Eval_centre_PolyMAC_Elem
Evaluateur PolyMAC pour la convection
Le champ convecte est scalaire (Champ_P0_PolyMAC)
Schema de convection Centre
Rq:Les evaluateurs de flux convectifs calculent en fait le terme
convectif qui figure au second membre de l'equation d'evolution
c.a.d l'oppose du flux convectif More...

#include <Eval_centre_PolyMAC_Elem.h>

Detailed Description

class Eval_centre_PolyMAC_Elem
Evaluateur PolyMAC pour la convection
Le champ convecte est scalaire (Champ_P0_PolyMAC)
Schema de convection Centre
Rq:Les evaluateurs de flux convectifs calculent en fait le terme
convectif qui figure au second membre de l'equation d'evolution
c.a.d l'oppose du flux convectif

See also:
Eval_Conv_PolyMAC

Reimplemented from Eval_PolyMAC_Elem.

Definition at line 1150 of file Eval_centre_PolyMAC_Elem.h.

References amont_amont(), Eval_Conv_PolyMAC::dt_vitesse, Evaluateur_PolyMAC::elem_, Eval_PolyMAC_Elem::inconnue, Evaluateur_PolyMAC::porosite, qcentre(), DoubleVect::size(), and Evaluateur_PolyMAC::surface.

{
  int k;
  int i = elem_(face,0);
  int j = elem_(face,1);
  int i0_0 = amont_amont(face,0);
  int j1_1 = amont_amont(face,1);
  double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface[face]*porosite[face];
  ArrOfDouble flux(aii.size());

// on applique le schema centre2
  qcentre(psc,i,j,i0_0,j1_1,face,inconnue->valeurs(),flux);
  if (psc > 0)
    for (k=0; k<aii.size(); k++)
      aii(k) = -flux(k);
  else
    for (k=0; k<ajj.size(); k++)
      ajj(k) = -flux(k);
}

{
  int i = elem_(face,0);
// int j = elem(face,1);
  double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
  if (i != -1)

    }
  else   //!< n1 != -1

      if (psc < 0)
        ajj = -psc;
    }
}

{
// 30/05/2002 : Codage Periodicite.
// // ALEX C.
  int i = elem_(face,0);
  int j = elem_(face,1);
  int i0_0 = amont_amont(face,0);
  int j1_1 = amont_amont(face,1);
  double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface[face]*porosite[face];

// on applique le schema centre
  if (psc > 0)
    aii = -qcentre(psc,i,j,i0_0,j1_1,face,inconnue->valeurs());
  else
    ajj = -qcentre(psc,i,j,i0_0,j1_1,face,inconnue->valeurs());
}

Definition at line 1027 of file Eval_centre_PolyMAC_Elem.h.

References Eval_Conv_PolyMAC::dt_vitesse, Evaluateur_PolyMAC::elem_, Evaluateur_PolyMAC::porosite, DoubleVect::size(), and Evaluateur_PolyMAC::surface.

{
  int k;
  int i = elem_(face,0);
// int j = elem(face,1);
  double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
  if (i != -1)
    {

    }
  else   //!< n1 != -1

      if (psc < 0)
        for(k=0; k<ajj.size(); k++)
          ajj(k) = -psc;
    }
}

  if (psc > 0)
    for (k=0; k<aii.size(); k++)
      aii(k) = -flux(k);
  else
    for (k=0; k<ajj.size(); k++)
      ajj(k) = -flux(k);
  /*     } */
}
void Eval_centre_PolyMAC_Elem::coeffs_faces_interne ( int  face,
double &  aii,
double &  ajj 
) const [inline, virtual]

< on applique le schema amont

< on applique le schema centre

Reimplemented from Eval_PolyMAC_Elem.

Definition at line 718 of file Eval_centre_PolyMAC_Elem.h.

References amont_amont(), Eval_Conv_PolyMAC::dt_vitesse, Evaluateur_PolyMAC::elem_, Eval_PolyMAC_Elem::inconnue, Evaluateur_PolyMAC::porosite, qcentre(), and Evaluateur_PolyMAC::surface.

{
  int i = elem_(face,0);
  int j = elem_(face,1);
  int i0_0 = amont_amont(face,0);
  int j1_1 = amont_amont(face,1);
  double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface[face]*porosite[face];

  if ( (i0_0 == -1) || (j1_1 == -1) ) //!< on applique le schema amont
    if (psc > 0)
      aii = -psc;
    else
      ajj = -psc;

  else  //!< on applique le schema centre
    if (psc > 0)
      aii = -qcentre(psc,i,j,i0_0,j1_1,face,inconnue->valeurs());
    else
      ajj = -qcentre(psc,i,j,i0_0,j1_1,face,inconnue->valeurs());
}

< n1 != -1

Implements Eval_PolyMAC_Elem.

Definition at line 533 of file Eval_centre_PolyMAC_Elem.h.

References Eval_Conv_PolyMAC::dt_vitesse, Evaluateur_PolyMAC::elem_, Evaluateur_PolyMAC::porosite, Evaluateur_PolyMAC::surface, and Neumann_sortie_libre::val_ext().

{
  int n0 = elem_(face,0);
  int n1 = elem_(face,1);
  double flux;
  double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
  if (n0 != -1)
    {
      if (psc > 0)
        flux= psc*inco[n0];
      else
        flux= psc*la_cl.val_ext(face-num1);
    }
  else   //!< n1 != -1
    {
      if (psc > 0)
        flux=psc*la_cl.val_ext(face-num1);
      else
        flux= psc*inco[n1];
    }
  return -flux;
}

Definition at line 306 of file Eval_centre_PolyMAC_Elem.h.

{
  int n0 = elem_(face,0);
  int n1 = elem_(face,1);
  double flux;
  double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
  double T_imp = la_cl.val_imp(face-num1);
  if (n0 != -1)
    {
      if (psc > 0)
        flux= psc*inco[n0];
      else
        flux= psc*T_imp;
    }
  else   //!< n1 != -1
    {
      if (psc>0)
        flux= psc*T_imp;
      else
        flux= psc*inco[n1];
    }
  return -flux;
}

References Eval_Conv_PolyMAC::dt_vitesse, Evaluateur_PolyMAC::elem_, Evaluateur_PolyMAC::porosite, Evaluateur_PolyMAC::surface, and Neumann_sortie_libre::val_ext().

{
  double flux=0;
  int i = elem_(face,0);
// int j = elem(face,1);
  double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
  if (i != -1)
    {
      if (psc < 0)
        flux = psc*la_cl.val_ext(face-num1);
    }
  else   //!< j != -1
    {
      if (psc > 0)
        flux = psc*la_cl.val_ext(face-num1);
    }
  return -flux;
}

Definition at line 811 of file Eval_centre_PolyMAC_Elem.h.

References Eval_Conv_PolyMAC::dt_vitesse, Evaluateur_PolyMAC::elem_, Evaluateur_PolyMAC::porosite, DoubleVect::size(), Evaluateur_PolyMAC::surface, and Dirichlet::val_imp().

{
  int k;
  int i = elem_(face,0);
// int j = elem(face,1);
  double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
  if (i != -1)
    {
      if (psc < 0)
        for(k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
          flux(k) = -psc*la_cl.val_imp(face-num1);
    }
  else   //!< j != -1
    {
      if (psc > 0)
        for(k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
          flux(k) = -psc*la_cl.val_imp(face-num1);
    }
}
